# idsec_cmgr_pool (Data Source)

Cmgr Pool data source, reads pool information and metadata, based on the id of the pool.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_cmgr_pool" "example_pool" {
  pool_id = var.pool_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `pool_id` (String) ID of the pool to get

### Optional

- `assigned_network_ids` (List of String) Assigned networks of the pool
- `components_count` (Map of Number) Count of components on the pool
- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the pool
- `description` (String) Description of the pool
- `identifiers_count` (Number) Count of identifiers on the pool
- `name` (String) Name of the pool
- `updated_at` (String) The last update time of the pool
